mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_FRANCHISE_T.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FRANCHISE_T ( FRN_NO, FRN_NAME, FRN_OWNER, FRN_TEL, FRN_ZIP, FRN_STREET, FRN_DETAIL, FRN_START_TIME, FRN_END_TIME, FRN_JOIN_DT ) VALUES ( #{frnNo}, #{frnName}, #{frnOwner}, #{frnTel}, #{frnZip}, #{frnStreet}, #{frnDetail}, #{frnStartTime}, #{frnEndTime}, #{frnJoinDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_IMG, F.FRN_OWNER, F.FRN_TEL, F.FRN_ZIP, F.FRN_STREET, F.FRN_DETAIL, F.FRN_JOIN_DT, F.FRN_START_TIME, F.FRN_END_TIME, E.EMP_NO FROM FRANCHISE_T F LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON F.FRN_NO = E.FRN_NO WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO FRANCHISE_T USING DUAL ON (FRN_NO = #{frnNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET FRN_IMG = #{frnImg}, MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (FRN_NO, FRN_IMG, CREATE_DT) VALUES (#{frnNo}, #{frnImg}, CURRENT_DATE)

MERGE INTO FRANCHISE_T USING DUAL ON (FRN_NO = #{frnAddressDto.frnNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET FRN_ZIP = #{frnAddressDto.frnZip}, FRN_STREET = #{frnAddressDto.frnStreet}, FRN_DETAIL = #{frnAddressDto.frnDetail}, MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE, MODIFIER = #{modifier} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (FRN_NO, FRN_ZIP, FRN_STREET, FRN_DETAIL, CREATE_DT, CREATER) VALUES (#{frnAddressDto.frnNo}, #{frnAddressDto.frnZip}, #{frnAddressDto.frnStreet}, #{frnAddressDto.frnDetail}, CURRENT_DATE, #{modifier})
